W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_DETAIL.text: A witch of the black and witch of the red are fighting. Is it possible to get them to cooperate?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_DETA.text: A witch of the blue and witch of the yellow are fighting. Is it possible to get them to cooperate?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Is this part of the Calamity? Or is Pulchra itself trying to assist you in some way?

W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_SCAN_AMYA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: Even the Arch Witch succumbed to crystallization. You've no choice but to proceed along the path shown by Macha's magic.

W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: Your Witchterms are over and you have returned to Pulchra. Time to become a full-fledged witch!

W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: Your Witchterms are over and you have returned to Pulchra. You had hoped to become a full-fledged witch, but now you've got to deal with the Calamity that has come to your home!

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_RED_000_TITLE.text: Fire and Water Out of Balance

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_TITL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_YELLOW_000_TITL.text: Wood and Earth Out of Balance

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_YELLOW_000_DET.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_YELLOW_000_DET.text: You're starting you realize why the world is crystallizing. Time to get your comrades on board.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_RED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_RED_000_DETAIL.text: You're starting you realize why the world is crystallizing. Time to get your comrades on board.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_BLUE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_BLUE_000_TITLE.text: Saving the world: Black and Blue

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_BLUE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_BLUE_000_DETAI.text: The key to saving the world may lie with the mirror's shards. Defeat the Calamity fiend and reclaim them.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_RED_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_RED_000_TITLE.text: Saving the world: Yellow and Red

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_RED_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_RED_000_DETAI.text: The key to saving the world may lie with the mirror's shards. Defeat the Calamity fiend and reclaim them.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_ROAD_000_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_ROAD_000_.text: You're retrieved the mirror's shards, but what awaits you in the Mistkeep?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_000_DETAI.text: You feel as though the Mistkeep is calling out to you. Your curiosity has brought you this far, so no giving up now!

W02_EVAR_AMYA_AQUEDUCT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_AQUEDUCT_000_DETAIL.text: Fighting the fiends in the channel could provide an opportunity for growth.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_MINE_000_DETAIL.text: Fighting the fiends in the mines could provide an opportunity for growth.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_FIRETOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_FIRETOWER_000_DETAIL.text: Fighting the fiends in the Scorching Tower could provide an opportunity for growth.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSAMAGNA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSAMAGNA_000_DETAIL.text: Fighting the fiends in the gulch could provide an opportunity for growth.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_MOKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_MOKU_000_DETAIL.text: Fighting the fiends in the forest could provide an opportunity for growth.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_000_DETAIL.text: The lands of the white witches are your home. You must face the Calamity without fear.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_100_DETAIL.text: The lands of the white witches are your home. You must face the Calamity without fear.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_TITLE.text: Victory is Near for the White

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_WHITE_200_DETAIL.text: The lands of the white witches are your home. You must face the Calamity without fear.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_000_DETAIL.text: The yellow witches are engaged in battle. Is Willma okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_100_DETAIL.text: The immediate danger has passed, but you can't let your guard down. Is Willma okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_TITLE.text: Victory is Near for the Yellow

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_YELLOW_200_DETAIL.text: Check on Willma, who is cleaning up the stragglers.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_000_DETAIL.text: The black witches are engaged in battle. Is Grete okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_100_DETAIL.text: The immediate danger has passed, but you can't let your guard down. Is Grete okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_TITLE.text: Victory is Near for the Black

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLACK_200_DETAIL.text: Check on Grete, who is cleaning up the stragglers.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_000_DETAIL.text: The red witches are engaged in battle. Is Red Orchid okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_100_DETAIL.text: The immediate danger has passed, but you can't let your guard down. Is Red Orchid okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_TITLE.text: Victory is Near for the Red

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_RED_200_DETAIL.text: Check on Red Orchid, who is cleaning up the stragglers.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_000_DETAIL.text: The blue witches are engaged in battle. Is Lita okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_100_DETAIL.text: The immediate danger has passed, but you can't let your guard down. Is Lita okay?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_TITLE.text: Victory is Near for the Blue

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_BLUE_200_DETAIL.text: Check on Lita, who is cleaning up the stragglers.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_TOWER_000_DETAIL.text: If you can clear out the crystallization, you should emerge victorious over the Calamity. Time to consult your allies.

W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_DETAI.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_HISOU_OLD_CASTLE_100_DETAI.text: The Grey Witch must pay for trying to fracture the bond between your comrades!

W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_000_DETAIL.text: You have defeated the Grey Witch. What are you supposed to do with such overwhelming power?

W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_AMYA_BRILLIANTTOWER_100_DETAIL.text: Everyone worked together to best the Grey Witch. The time to end the Calamity is nigh.

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLA_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLA_DETAIL.text: Although the battlegrounds have been cleared out, Castle Black Swan is still crystallized. Is there another incident to clear up?

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLU_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLU_TITLE.text: The Tree of the Forever Young, Crystallized

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLU_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_BLU_DETAIL.text: Although the battlegrounds have been cleared out, the Tree of the Forever Young is still crystallized. Is there another incident to clear up?

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_RED_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_RED_DETAIL.text: Although the battlegrounds have been cleared out, the Flame Fortress is still crystallized. Is there another incident to clear up?

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_YEL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_YEL_DETAIL.text: Although the battlegrounds have been cleared out, the Dusk Pinwheel is still crystallized. Is there another incident to clear up?

W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_WHI_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_AMYA_CASTLE_WHI_DETAIL.text: Although the battlegrounds have been cleared out, Leone Bianco Palazzo is still crystallized. Is there another incident to clear up?
